hero.title: Professional Counseling Services in West Lafayette
hero.subtitle: Take the first step towards healing and growth with compassionate, evidence-based therapy in a warm and welcoming environment.

about.title: About Anisa Counseling Group
about.description: We are a team of licensed mental health professionals dedicated to providing compassionate, personalized care to individuals, couples, and families. Our approach combines evidence-based therapeutic techniques with a deep understanding of each client's unique needs and circumstances.

staff.title: Meet Our Team
staff.description: Our compassionate team of licensed therapists brings diverse backgrounds and specialties to provide you with the best possible care.

members.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
members.title: Clinical Director
members.description: Dr. Johnson has over 15 years of experience in family and couples therapy. She specializes in attachment-based interventions and trauma-informed care.

members.name: Michael Chen
members.title: Licensed Therapist
members.description: Michael brings a holistic approach to therapy, combining cognitive-behavioral techniques with mindfulness practices to help clients achieve lasting change.

members.name: Lisa Rodriguez
members.title: Licensed Clinical Social Worker
members.description: Lisa specializes in working with adolescents and young adults, helping them navigate the challenges of identity development and mental health.

contact.title: Get Started Today
contact.description: Ready to take the first step? Contact us to schedule your initial consultation.
